name: Azurite
description: One would think Azurite is blue, but nope!  +5 AGI

name: Bloodstone
description: When the tears of those who fail Wes' test come together they form a bloodstone.  It is said that holding this while taking an exam brings forth the knowledge of failures past.

name: Zircon
description: After the Elric brothers defeated scar-san, only this remained of the city.  +5 Spellpower.
